personal.name: Edress Safi
personal.title: Full Stack Developer & Software Engineer
personal.tagline: Building innovative web solutions with modern technologies
personal.bio: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience creating scalable web applications. I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful, and intuitive solutions. When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies or contributing to open-source projects.

experience.description: Lead development of enterprise-level web applications using React, Node.js, and AWS. Mentored junior developers and implemented CI/CD pipelines.
achievements: Reduced application load time by 40% through optimization
Led a team of 5 developers on multiple projects

experience.description: Developed MVP for a SaaS platform using React, Python, and PostgreSQL. Collaborated closely with design and product teams.
achievements: Built the entire frontend from scratch

projects.title: EcommercePro
projects.description: A complete e-commerce solution with admin dashboard, payment integration, and real-time inventory management.

projects.title: TaskFlow
projects.description: Project management tool with real-time collaboration, file sharing, and advanced reporting features.

projects.title: WeatherApp
projects.description: Beautiful weather application with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and weather alerts.

projects.title: BlogCMS
projects.description: Content management system with markdown support, SEO optimization, and multi-author collaboration.

testimonials.name: John Doe
testimonials.content: John consistently delivers high-quality code and has excellent problem-solving skills. His ability to translate complex requirements into elegant solutions is outstanding.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.content: Working with Alex was a game-changer for our startup. He built our entire platform from the ground up and delivered beyond our expectations.
